basic_data.Recipient Name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA AT RIVERSIDE
basic_data.Description: THE PRIMARY PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS TO SUPPORT THE FUNCTIONS OF THE CITRUS CLONAL PROTECTION PROGRAM (CCPP) AT UCR, FOR THE PRODUCTION UNDER QUARANTINE, VIA THERAPY AND DIAGNOSTICS, OF PATHOGEN-TESTED CLEAN CITRUS GERMPLASM, AS WELL AS THE MAINTENANCE OF CITRUS TREE SOURCES FOR THE DISTRIBUTION OF PATHOGEN-TESTED CLEAN PLANT UNITS (I.E., CITRUS BUDWOOD/BUDS), FROM CCPP’S FOUNDATION FACILITIES, FOR CITRUS TREE PROPAGATION, BY PRODUCERS CITRUS INDUSTRY (NURSERIES AND GROWERS), SCIENTISTS, AND THE PUBLIC. THE CCPP IS OPERATING ON SIX FUNCTIONAL PILLARS: 1. INTRODUCTION OF CITRUS VARIETIES UNDER QUARANTINE IN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA 2. TESTING OF THE CITRUS VARIETIES’ PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL FOR GRAFT-TRANSMISSIBLE DISEASES/PATHOGENS 3. ELIMINATION OF GRAFT-TRANSMISSIBLE PATHOGENS FROM THE PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL 4. MAINTENANCE AND CONTINUOUS PATHOGEN RE-TESTING OF THE SOURCES OF THE CITRUS PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL 5. DISTRIBUTION OF PATHOGEN-TESTED AND TRUE-TO-TYPE PRIMARY CITRUS PROPAGATIVEMATERIAL 6. EXTENSION OF SCIENTIFIC INFORMATION FOR CITRUS DIAGNOSTICS, THERAPY, GERMPLASM, DISEASE MANAGEMENT, AND NOVEL CITRICULTURE TECHNOLOGIES. THIS PROJECT WILL PROVIDE A SAFE MECHANISM FOR INTRODUCTION INTO CALIFORNIA AND NCPN-CITRUS OF CITRUS VARIETIES FROM ANY CITRUS-GROWING AREA OF THE WORLD FOR RESEARCH, VARIETY IMPROVEMENT, OR FOR USE BY THE COMMERCIAL INDUSTRY OR CITRUS ENTHUSIASTS, IN COMPLIANCE WITH STATE AND FEDERAL REGULATIONS AND IT WILL PERFORM EXTENSION AND OUTREACH ON ALL TOPICS RELATED TO CITRUS CLEAN PLANT PROPAGATIVE MATERIALS.
basic_data.Awarding Sub Agency: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

THIS PROJECT WILL PROVIDE A SAFE MECHANISM FOR INTRODUCTION INTO CALIFORNIA AND NCPN-CITRUS OF CITRUS VARIETIES FROM ANY CITRUS-GROWING AREA OF THE WORLD FOR RESEARCH, VARIETY IMPROVEMENT, OR FOR USE BY THE COMMERCIAL INDUSTRY OR CITRUS ENTHUSIASTS, IN COMPLIANCE WITH STATE AND FEDERAL REGULATIONS AND IT WILL PERFORM EXTENSION AND OUTREACH ON ALL TOPICS RELATED TO CITRUS CLEAN PLANT PROPAGATIVE MATERIALS.
